description: I had to check the calendar if it wasn't Halloween today because I got visited by a monster-dick. The boy looked very nice, he was polite and we had a pleasant conversation. He had skills and seemed capable so I offered him a junior manager position. As usual, there was a problem with our mediation fee but after a heated discussion the boy agreed to undress. Then I saw the monster for the first time. The boy had the biggest cock I've ever encountered in my life. I would never let him fuck me. Thank god I didn't have to. The guy had to be super horny because he got a boner almost instantly and really enjoyed the whole ride.
title: Dirty Scout 184
